site.name: 8px.app
site.description: Craft your perfect colors and icons. 8px.app offers a free toolkit for web and app developers, including favicon generation, color palette creation, SVG optimization, and more. No account needed, start creating instantly.
site.heroDescription: Your vision, your design. A comprehensive toolkit for web and app developers. Completely free, entirely open source.

tw-palette-generator.name: TW Palette Generator
tw-palette-generator.description: Generate a complete Tailwind CSS color palette from any base color. Easily create harmonious, production-ready color scales (50-950) that align perfectly with your brand, all for free.
tw-palette-generator.shortDescription: Create Tailwind CSS color palettes from a single hue.

iromide.name: Iromide - Fave Color Generator
iromide.description: Discover your favorite colors! Iromide is a free tool that extracts a palette of your most cherished hues from any photo using advanced perceptual image analysis. Share your unique 'polaroid-style' color memory easily on social media.

favicon-generator.name: Favicon Generator
favicon-generator.description: Instantly create all the favicons your website needs! This free tool generates multi-platform favicons and Apple Touch Icons from your PNG, JPEG, or SVG images. Easily customize rounded corners and background colors, all within your browser.
favicon-generator.shortDescription: Turn any image into a complete favicon set.

svg-optimizer.name: SVG Optimizer
svg-optimizer.description: Boost your website's performance with our free SVG Optimizer. Reduce file sizes, maintain visual quality, and speed up load times. All optimizations are performed securely and rapidly directly in your browser.
svg-optimizer.shortDescription: Streamline and compress your SVG files.

password-generator.name: Password Generator
password-generator.description: Generate robust, secure passwords with our free online tool. Customize length, include/exclude uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols. We even offer an option to avoid ambiguous characters (like '0' and 'O'). All generation happens securely in your browser.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn about our handling of personal information and data processing.

common.privacyNotice: Images are processed securely in your browser and never sent to our servers.
common.dragDropAnywhere: Or drag and drop anywhere on the screen.
common.imageProcessingOnlyNotice: Your images are processed for transformation only and are not stored.
common.networkError: A network error occurred. Please wait a moment and try again.

faviconGenerator.uploadHint: Upload PNG, JPG, WEBP, SVG, or other image files (max 10MB).
faviconGenerator.borderRadiusHint: Rounds the corners of your icon. iOS automatically applies rounded corners to Apple Touch Icons.
faviconGenerator.backgroundColorHint: Adds a background color to transparent PNGs. A background color is always applied to Apple Touch Icons.

errors.selectOutputFormat: Please select at least one output format.
errors.selectSize: If favicon.ico is selected, please choose at least one size.

twPaletteGenerator.historyEmptyMessage: Your generated color palettes will appear here when saved.

passwordGenerator.characterTypesHint: Selected character types will each include at least one character.
passwordGenerator.avoidAmbiguousHint: e.g., 0 and O, 1 and l and I

svgOptimizer.precisionHint: Adjust the numeric precision. Lower values increase compression but reduce accuracy.

groups.dangerousDescription: Security risks are present. Only use with trusted SVG files.

errors.shareNotSupported: Sharing is not supported in your browser. Please download the image instead.
errors.shareText: What are your cherished colors? Create a palette with Iromide!
